00024 // Init statix data for the DnsSdProx class
00025 ReentrantMutex DnsSdProxy::Locker;
00026 unsigned int DnsSdProxy::InstancesCount = 0; // Start with 0 instances
00027 unsigned int DnsSdProxy::CurrentNumberOfClients = 0; // Start with 0 customers
00028 bool DnsSdProxy::NeedToCleanupServicesList = false;    // At start we do not need to cleanup everything
00029 SimpleList<DnsSdProxy::DnsSdServiceInstanceManager*> DnsSdProxy::ServicesList;
00030 Event DnsSdProxy::Changes;
00031 BrowseForDNSSDService * DnsSdProxy::ServiceBroswer = NULL;    // protected by a mutex

00048 DnsSdServicesList::DnsSdServicesList()
00049 {
00050     DnsSdProxy::Locker.EnterMutex();
00051     DnsSdProxy::CurrentNumberOfClients++;
00052     DnsSdProxy::Locker.LeaveMutex();
00053 }
00054
00055 DnsSdServicesList::~DnsSdServicesList()
00056 {
00057     DnsSdProxy::Locker.EnterMutex();
00058     DnsSdProxy::CurrentNumberOfClients--;
00059     DnsSdProxy::Locker.LeaveMutex();
00060 }
00061
00062 DnsSdProxy::DnsSdProxy()
00063 {
00064     Locker.EnterMutex();
00065
00066     InstancesCount++;
00067     if ( InstancesCount == 1 )
00068     {
00069         // First Instance
00070         OmiscidTrace( "Launch DnsSdProxy instance.\n" );
00071
00072         // Reset Event (in case we were over 1 instance, under 1 and them over 1 again
00073         Changes.Reset();
00074
00075         ServiceBroswer = new OMISCID_TLM BrowseForDNSSDService( CommonServiceValues::OmiscidServiceDnsSdType, BrowseCollect, (void *)this, true);
00076         if ( ServiceBroswer == NULL )
00077         {
00078             OmiscidError( "Launch DnsSdProxy instance => failed\n" );
00079             // Let InstancesCount be 0, we will retry later
00080             InstancesCount = 0;
00081             NeedToCleanupServicesList = false;
00082         }
00083     }
00084     Locker.LeaveMutex();
00085 }
00086
00087 DnsSdProxy::~DnsSdProxy()
00088 {
00089     Locker.EnterMutex();
00090
00091     if ( InstancesCount == 1 )
00092     {
00093         // I am the last Instance
00094         InstancesCount = 0;
00095         OmiscidTrace( "Last DnsSdProxy instance. Stop it.\n" );
00096
00097         // Empty the list of current services
00098         while( ServicesList.GetNumberOfElements() != 0 )
00099         {
00100             delete ServicesList.ExtractFirst();
00101         }
00102
00103         // Say that we do not need to do cleanup action
00104         NeedToCleanupServicesList = false;
00105
00106         if ( ServiceBroswer )
00107         {
00108             // Leave mutex to prevent deadlock
00109             Locker.LeaveMutex();
00110             delete ServiceBroswer;
00111
00112             // Reenter mutex
00113             Locker.EnterMutex();
00114             ServiceBroswer = NULL;
00115         }
00116
00117         // Send signals to wake up everybody waiting...
00118         Changes.Signal();
00119     }
00120     Locker.LeaveMutex();
00121 }
00122
00123 bool DnsSdProxy::IsEnabled()
00124 {
00125     bool ret = false;
00126
00127     Locker.EnterMutex();
00128
00129     // Shall we cleanup the services list
00130     CleanupServicesList();
00131
00132     // Is there some proxy running ?
00133     if ( InstancesCount > 0 )
00134     {
00135         ret = true;
00136     }
00137     Locker.LeaveMutex();
00138
00139     return ret;
00140 }
00141
00142 void FUNCTION_CALL_TYPE DnsSdProxy::BrowseCollect( DnsSdService& NewService, DNSServiceFlags flags, void * UserData )
00143 {
00144     DnsSdServiceInstanceManager * pServiceInfo;
00145
00146     Locker.EnterMutex(); // To prevent destroy of myself...
00147
00148     // Look is we need to continue to work
00149     if ( InstancesCount == 0 )
00150     {
00151         // quit
00152         Locker.LeaveMutex();
00153         return;
00154     }
00155
00156     if ( flags & kDNSServiceFlagsAdd )
00157     {
00158         // A new service appears
00159         // Copy each members of this list into the new list
00160         pServiceInfo = new OMISCID_TLM DnsSdServiceInstanceManager( NewService );
00161         if ( pServiceInfo != NULL )
00162         {
00163             ServicesList.AddTail( pServiceInfo );
00164             // Said to the waiters that a service appears
00165             Changes.Signal();
00166         }
00167
00168         // Shall we cleanup the List ?
00169         CleanupServicesList();
00170     }
00171     else
00172     {
00173         // A new service desappears.
00174         // Search it in the list
00175         for( ServicesList.First(); ServicesList.NotAtEnd(); ServicesList.Next() )
00176         {
00177             // Copy each members of this list into the new list
00178             if ( ServicesList.GetCurrent()->CompleteServiceName.EqualsCaseInsensitive( NewService.CompleteServiceName )  )
00179             {
00180                 // Ok, we've got it, can we remove it ?
00181                 if ( CurrentNumberOfClients == 0 )
00182                 {
00183                     pServiceInfo = ServicesList.GetCurrent();
00184                     ServicesList.RemoveCurrent();
00185                     delete pServiceInfo;
00186                 }
00187                 else
00188                 {
00189                     // Say that we will remove it in the future
00190                     ServicesList.GetCurrent()->IsPresent = false;
00191                     NeedToCleanupServicesList = true;
00192                 }
00193
00194                 // Say something change
00195                 Changes.Signal();
00196                 break;
00197             }
00198         }
00199     }
00200
00201     Locker.LeaveMutex();
00202 }
00203
00204 DnsSdServicesList * DnsSdProxy::GetCurrentServicesList()
00205 {
00206     Locker.EnterMutex();
00207
00208     // Is there some proxy running ?
00209     if ( InstancesCount == 0 )
00210     {
00211         Locker.LeaveMutex();
00212         return NULL;
00213     }
00214
00215     // Shall we cleanup the services list
00216     CleanupServicesList();
00217
00218     DnsSdServicesList * pList = new OMISCID_TLM DnsSdServicesList;
00219     if ( pList == NULL )
00220     {
00221         Locker.LeaveMutex();
00222         return NULL;
00223     }
00224
00225     for( ServicesList.First(); ServicesList.NotAtEnd(); ServicesList.Next() )
00226     {
00227         // Copy each members of this list into the new list
00228         DnsSdServiceInstanceManager * pServiceInfo = ServicesList.GetCurrent();
00229         // If the service is here, put it in the list
00230         if ( pServiceInfo->IsPresent == true )
00231         {
00232             pList->AddTail( ServicesList.GetCurrent() );
00233         }
00234     }
00235
00236     Locker.LeaveMutex();
00237
00238     return pList;
00239 }

00241 bool DnsSdProxy::AddClient( DnsSdProxyClient * Client )
00242 {
00243     if ( Client == NULL )
00244     {
00245         return false;
00246     }
00247
00248     Locker.EnterMutex();
00249
00250     // Shall we cleanup the services list
00251     CleanupServicesList();
00252
00253     ClientsList.AddTail( Client );
00254     Locker.LeaveMutex();
00255
00256     return true;
00257 }
00258
00259 bool DnsSdProxy::RemoveClient( DnsSdProxyClient * Client )
00260 {
00261     if ( Client == NULL )
00262     {
00263         return false;
00264     }
00265
00266     Locker.EnterMutex();
00267
00268     // Shall we cleanup the services list
00269     CleanupServicesList();
00270
00271     for( ClientsList.First(); ClientsList.NotAtEnd(); ClientsList.Next() )
00272     {
00273         if ( ClientsList.GetCurrent() == Client )
00274         {
00275             ClientsList.RemoveCurrent();
00276             Locker.LeaveMutex();
00277             return true;
00278         }
00279     }
00280     Locker.LeaveMutex();
00281
00282
00283     return false;
00284 }
00285
00286 bool DnsSdProxy::WaitForChanges(unsigned int TimeToWait)
00287 {
00288     if ( DnsSdProxy::IsEnabled() == false )
00289     {
00290         return false;
00291     }
00292
00293     return Changes.Wait( TimeToWait );
00294 }
